name: featurerecommender
title: Feature Recommender
description: This addon recommends Firefox interface features when they are needed. It is a temporary experimental feature installed through the Mozilla Test Pilot platform (https://testpilot.mozillalabs.com/). The goal of the study is to understand what the best way to present these recommendations is.
author: Kamyar Ardekani <kamyar@mozilla.com>
